{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|ConversionOperator}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept ConversionOperator = Operator&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; MemberFunction&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|ConversionOperator}} concept is satisfied if and only if T reflects a conversion function.
